stories.narrative:
In order to buy goods through website
As a user
I want to have an ability to add items into the cart
stories.name: rozetka_scenarios.story
stories.scenarios:
Scenario:test when delivery cost is 35 UAH
Given product page https://www.rozetka.com.ua
And I am logged in on the product page
And I add the items into the cart by pressing the button-Buy
When the sum of items in the cart is less than 1500 UAH
Then the delivery cost is 35 UAH

stepMatches.annotatedPattern: I am logged in on the product page

usages.scenario: test when delivery cost is 35 UAH
usages.step: And I am logged in on the product page
